trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Jasper
There were no other sightings in Jasper on or around August 9th 2010
Summary: I saw a silver bullet flying over the top of the trees
divs: Sighting DetailsI was setting in a lawn chair reading the bible and i got to a part where god said go out in the field or meadow or something and i will show you a sign so for some reason i walked out into my grannys pastor and turned around and then across the road in the field i saw a silver bullet shaped ufo with no emission trail or anything flying over the top of the trees in a straight like i watched it until it was to far to see
